channel.title: Horse Girl TV: Horses For Wired Equine Enthusiasts
channel.itunes:subtitle: By an equestrian for the next generation of equestrians
channel.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
channel.itunes:summary: Horse Girl TV is by an equestrian for equestrians and horse enthusiasts of all ages and skill levels. HorseGirlTV plugs the classic equine world into the wired generation. The show is hosted by Angelea Kelly Walkup.
channel.description: Horse Girl TV is by an equestrian for equestrians and horse enthusiasts of all ages and skill levels. HorseGirlTV plugs the classic equine world into the wired generation. The show is hosted by Angelea Kelly Walkup.

item.title: Developing Your Equestrian Career with Anky
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: What was it like to groom for Anky van Grunsven at Aachen? How to develop your career.
item.itunes:summary: Educational and entertaining content is timeless which is why we're launching HorseGirlTV Classics! After producing five years of amazing equine-based content in new media we realized that some of our fan base may have never seen our early years. We take a look back to classic HorseGirlTV webisodes. What was it like grooming for Anky van Grunsven? Let's chat with Tiffany Tyler and find out. In this pilot episode of HorseGirlTV we meet former groom of Anky van Grunsen, Tiffany Tyler and learn some of Anky's grooming secrets! We catch up with Tiffany in Ashland, Oregon where she continues to develop her career in competitive equestrian sports. Tiffany plans to show this season and aspires to compete on an international level in the CDIs.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, dressage, anky, anky van grunsven, olympic, olympian

item.title: Importing Horses and CEM Quarantine Facilities
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: What you need to know about importing, CEM and secondary quarantine
item.itunes:summary: Educational and entertaining content is timeless which is why we've launched HorseGirlTV Classics! After producing five years of amazing equine-based content in new media we realized that some of our fan base may have never seen our early years. We take a look back to classic HorseGirlTV webisodes. What is involved with importing horses and secondary quarantine? Let's ask CEM facility owner, Penny Barerras and find out.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, horse tv, horse channel, equine, importing, cem, quarantine

item.title: It's Reining. It's Pouring.
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: What is competitive reining all about?
item.itunes:summary: Educational and entertaining content is timeless which is why we've launched HorseGirlTV Classics! After producing five years of amazing equine-based content in new media we realized that some of our fan base may have never seen our early years. We take a look back to classic HorseGirlTV webisodes. Follow Angelea, as she meets with reining trainer and competitor, John Irish to learn about this competitive FEI sport that is growing in popularity. "Whoa" is given a WHOLE new meaning with this sports sliding stops!
item.itunes:keywords: equestrian, horse, horse tv, horse channel, horses, equine, reining, western, sliding stop, spins

item.title: Athleticism of the Equestrian and the Equine Athlete
item.itunes:author: HorseGirl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Angelea learns about the athleticism of the equestrian and the equine athlete.
item.itunes:summary: We're back at Silver Spring Farm meeting with Lara Schliening, two time Cosequin Juniors Team and two time Young Rider Team competitor and FEI rider, to talk about the athleticism of the equestrian and the equine athlete. Lara trains with Anky van Grunsven and shows at the FEI level understanding the importance of treating yourself AND your horse as the athletes that they AND we are. Lara opens up to HorseGirlTV about her rigorous and dedicated training program for both herself and her horses!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, athlete, physial, training

item.title: Modern Day Cowboy
item.itunes:author: HorseGirl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Riding fence, roping and moving cattle are all in a days work for Richard Damon.
item.itunes:summary: Where has the real cowboy gone? Oh where or where can he be? In this episode Angelea takes a look at what ridin' fence, roping calves, and moving cattle are all about. This and more is part of the average workday for Richard Damon, real modern day cowboy. Join HorseGirl as she meets with Rich to learn about the lifestyle of this fading American icon!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, cowboy, western, roping, cattle, cows, herding, dogs

item.title: Innovative Riding Breeches
item.itunes:author: HorseGirl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: This episode Angelea takes a look at an innovative technology in breeches and learns about their design first hand from developer and entrepreneur Sheryl Rudolph.
item.itunes:summary: We all have had trouble getting our breeches on, issues with chafing and more importantly actually finding a pair that just fit! Did we say FITS? This episode Angelea takes a look at an innovative technology in breeches and learns about their design first hand from developer and entrepreneur Sheryl Rudolph.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, breech, clothes, tack, training, horses

item.title: Patrolling with the Mounted Police
item.itunes:author: HorseGirl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: What is a day in the life of a mounted police officer like? Check out this episode of HorseGirlTV to find out!
item.itunes:summary: Have you ever wanted a career in horses but didn't want to be a trainer, groom or exercise rider and are you too tall to be a jockey? What about a career working with the mounted police? It's a real 'ride along,' COPS style! Follow Angelea as she literally rides along on patrols with the Prince William County Mounted Police and discover this beneficial and rewarding career option.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, police, mounted police, cops, law, enforcement, patrol

item.title: Vote and Win Contest
item.itunes:author: HorseGirlTV
item.itunes:subtitle: Want your opinion to be heard? Want to help shape the programming of HorseGirlTV?
item.itunes:summary: We want to hear from you. Vote for your favorite episode, tell us why you like it and automatically be entered to win prizes. Simply click on the button below the video podcast to vote for your favorite episode. Winner will be announced in our next episode.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, contest, win, breeches, riding pants, giveaway, vote

item.title: Applying Standing Wraps
item.itunes:author: HorseGirlTV
item.itunes:subtitle: How to properly apply standing bandages and polo wraps
item.itunes:summary: Follow HorseGirl to Bluegrass Farm in Northern Virginia. In this episode Angelea takes a look at applying standing wraps and polos. Learn the ins and outs of proper application. We're announcing our contest winners in this episode!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, health, wraps, bandage, care

item.title: Hillary Dobbs: The teen at Grand Prix to watch
item.itunes:author: HorseGirlTV
item.itunes:subtitle: Competing with the best of the best at The Hampton Classic Grand Prix
item.itunes:summary: HorseGirlTV goes high style at The Hampton Classic. Catch up with Angelea in Bridgehampton, NY where she talks candidly with this years teen to watch, Hillary Dobbs. Catch a slice of life from this talented teen and discover what it is like to juggle Harvard, interning at CNN, and a string of successful mounts competing not only in the Adult Amateurs but holding her own against the best of the best in the Grand Prix ring.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, jumping, grand prix, hillary dobbs, lou dobbs, equestrian

item.title: Hors d'oeuvres and Horses at The Hampton Classic
item.itunes:author: HorseGirlTV
item.itunes:subtitle: Fabulous food. Top riders. Perfect weather. All at this year's Hampton Classic.
item.itunes:summary: Meet Chris Robbins of Robbins Wolfe Eventeurs for an exclusive luncheon at The Hampton Classic and learn about upscale event catering. Chris sat down with HorseGirl to speak about happenings, horses and The Hamptons!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, catering, food, events, jumping, hunter

item.title: Breyer Model Horses
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Breyer is the World's Premier Model Horse!
item.itunes:summary: It's a far cry from the # 57 Western Horse of the late 50s but Breyer Model Horses is still going strong and accurately capturing our equine friends. Catch up with the Breyer Horse Tour as it makes it's stop on the east coast. Angelea enjoyed a lively conversation with Breyer spokeswomen, Kathleen Fallon, and cozied up with a real live Breyer Model Horse! Watch as HorseGirlTV gets up close and personal with Breyer specialists and discovers the rich history of this home grown American company. Learn why Breyer is the model horse of choice for so many generations.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, breyer, model, hobbyist, breyer model horse, breyerfest

item.title: Bonus Material: Breyer Model Horse Hobbyist
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Breyer Model Horse Hobbyist collect, sell, show and trade.
item.itunes:summary: Model horse hobbyists collect, sell, show, trade and customize their Breyer models. For those of you interested in horses but not able to, due to scheduling, location or finances, ride becoming a horse hobbyist would be a great outlet to share your love of horses with others. We simply had too much good information from Kathleen Fallon to cut this out and opted to put it in as a bonus. A big, HUGE thank you to appaloosa for allowing HorseGirlTV to use her amazing photos from this past years Breyerfest!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, breyer, model, hobbyist, breyer horse, breyerfest

item.title: Steeplechase Horses At The International Gold Cup
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: International Gold Cup Steeplechase with Nick Arundel
item.itunes:summary: A menagerie of finely tuned equine athletes coupled with a plehtora of world class jockey talents comprise just some of the days events at the International Gold Cup in The Plains, Virginia. Follow HorseGirlTV as we get the exclusive behind the scenes look at the stables, the jockeys, the paddock and the events leading up to this world renound event. HorseGirlTV gets exclusive passes for this spectacular show of athleticism, precision and glory that IS the International Gold Cup!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, race, racing, steeplechase, timber racing, thoroughbred, jockey, jump jockey

item.title: Timber Racer and Jump Jockey, Carl Rafter
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Jump Jockey, Carl Rafter at The International Gold Cup Steeplechase Event
item.itunes:summary: Part two of our series and we catch jump jockey, Carl Rafter during the after party celebration. A menagerie of finely tuned equine athletes coupled with a plethora of world class jockey talents comprise just some of the days events at the International Gold Cup in The Plains, Virginia. Follow HorseGirlTV as we get the exclusive behind the scenes look at the stables, the jockeys, the paddock and the events leading up to this world renowned event. HorseGirlTV gets exclusive backstage passes for this spectacular show of athleticism, precision and glory that IS the International Gold Cup!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, race, racing, steeplechase, timber racing, thoroughbred, jockey, jump jockey

item.title: Holiday Wish List Giveaway with LC at Smartpak!
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: HorseGirlTV and Smartpak give away over $400 of equine products
item.itunes:summary: Happy Holidays from HorseGirlTV and our friends at Smartpak! Angelea connected with LC, co-host from the upcoming audio podcast Up on Horses from the Smartpak Network, to highlight some of this seasons top wish list items. Tune in to find out the hot picks on this years holiday shopping list. Plus, in the spirit of the holidays, we are giving it all away! All winners will be drawn at random from Team HorseGirlTV! Just join Team HorseGirlTV and watch our December 15th episode to find out if you won any of these fabulous items! Check out OVER $400 in cool equestrian products below as not all items are featured in this episode!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, holiday, prize, equine products, smartpak, free, giveaway, give away

item.title: US Park Police and Holiday Wish List Giveaway Winners!
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: US Park Police and Holiday Wish List Giveaway Winners!
item.itunes:summary: Angelea spoke with First Lieutenant Stacey Collins of the US Park Police from Washington DC. Discover the rich history of the US Park Police. Learn about their intensive 10 week course and the challenges and rewards of the US Park Police Musical Ride. What is life like for a mounted officer with a fulfilling career in public service. Getting paid to ride horses AND serve the community! PLUS in this episode we announce the Holiday Wish List Giveaway Winners! Thanks so much to SmartPak for giving HorseGirlTV over $400 in fabulous horse and rider prizes!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, police, mounted, prize, products, free, giveaway

item.title: horsegirltv 2.0
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: It is HorseGirlTV 2008! horsegirltv 2.0!
item.itunes:summary: Happy New Year! We had a GREAT year in 2007 and are looking forward to a pretty amazing line up for 2008! Stay tuned as we go International with shoots in Sweden, Germany, Canada and tentatively Ireland, Spain and Holland! Of course we'll still have fabulous coverage of stateside events spanning the gamut of the equine world. Watch for some serious training interviews, more riding, more helpful how to and of course in the spirit of HorseGirlTV they will all be educational while entertaining. Tune in. Tack up. and thanks for being a part of HorseGirlTV!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, new, international, products, free, interviews

item.title: Horse Publishing and Point to Points
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn about horse publishing and point to point with Chronicle of the Horse Publisher
item.itunes:summary: Angelea meets Robert Banner, Publisher of the top equine magazine stateside, The Chronicle of the Horse. Robert talks candidly about the equestrian publishing business as well as his passion for NAPPA (North American Point-to-Point Association) and helping developing young riders learn the basics. Our kids are our future of riding and NAPPA was created in order to take Steeplechasing back to its Foxhunting roots and rejuvenate amateur participation.
item.itunes:keywords: equestrian, horse, horses, equine, horse tv, horse video, interviews

item.title: Introduction to Fox Hunting
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: All the basics of fox hunting you could want to know
item.itunes:summary: What is fox hunting? Where did it come from? How can someone get involved in fox hunting? Why shouldwe support the preservation of our country's countryside? Get a glimpse of this and more in this introductory episode to fox hunting or more true to the event, fox chasing. HorseGirl met up with Joint Masters of the Old Dominion Hounds during a fundraiser to stop the expansion of the power lines. Several local hunt clubs joined forces for a mega-hunt fundraiser and some family fun! Catch this episode to learn more about this family oriented, true outdoor sport where horse, hound and human alike bond for a common goal! Enjoyment of the amazing Virginia countryside!
item.itunes:keywords: fox hunt, horse, horses, equine, horse tv, horse video, sport horse, interviews

item.title: Dressing for Fox Hunting and Fox Chasing
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn about the requirements for hunting habit
item.itunes:summary: What attire is required for fox hunting? Can I use some of my show jumping, dressage or eventing attire for fox hunting? Does the dress vary from hunt? Why do fox hunters wear a stock tie? Why those brick colored breeches in Virginia? These questions and more will be answered in this episode of HorseGirlTV. Angelea visits the fox hunting store in Virginia and the other 48 for that matter! Wendy, Horse Country's Sales Manager and resident fox hunting habit expert, talks with Angelea about the ins and outs of fox hunt attire and helps her get set up for the next installment of our fox hunting series... Stayed tuned as Angelea will be going fox hunting!
item.itunes:keywords: fox hunt, horse, horses, equine, horse tv, horse video, sport horse, interviews

item.title: In the Tack Basic Tack Requirements for Horseback Riding
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: What is the essential tack you need to go horseback riding
item.itunes:summary: Have you just bought your first horse and do not know the first thing about what else you need? Angelea gets down to the basics with Wendy at Horse Country in Warrenton, Virginia to discuss the different types of saddles, bridles, girths and other things you might need to get yourself and your first horse in the tack. This episode also discussed styles of saddles and touches on saddle fitting for those more seasoned equestrians!
item.itunes:keywords: tack, tacking, horse, horses, equine, horse tv, horse video, sport horse, interviews

item.title: Riding to Hounds in America
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Answers to some basic questions about the sport of fox hunting
item.itunes:summary: Angelea answers some recent questions HorseGirlTV has received about riding to hounds in America. Enjoy glimpses of the amazing Virginia countryside and follow along as we car follow a Joint meet with Old Dominion Hounds and Keswick.
item.itunes:keywords: fox hunt, horse, horses, equine, horse tv, horse video, sport horse, interviews

item.title: Inside Stubben North America
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn the basics from a world premiere saddlery
item.itunes:summary: Meet Jim Erhmann, President of Stubben North America, and learn about one of the worlds oldest and best saddle companies. Angelea travels to Stubben North America to discover what it takes to be a top saddle maker.
item.itunes:keywords: saddles, stubben, horse, ride, horse tv, horse video, saddlery, interviews

item.title: Horse Statues in Washington DC
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: The most horse statues in any city in the USA
item.itunes:summary: Washington DC is many things... the hub of our nations politics, a melting pot of individuals, a history rich area but it also is THE city with the most horse statues in our entire country. Come along for the tour of several of our favorites!
item.itunes:keywords: statues, washington, dc, horse, ride, horse tv, horse video, boots, interviews

item.title: How To Custom Fit Your Boots
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Step by step instructions for taking professional custom boot measurements
item.itunes:summary: Not in an area where you can get professionally fitted? It's as easy as 1, 2, 3. Well there is a few more than three steps but custom fitting boot measurements are not that hard. Watch and learn from Dehner Boot Company President, Jeff Ketzler.
item.itunes:keywords: boots, dress, riding, hunt, fitting, horse, horse riding, professional, interviews

item.title: Training US Park Police Mounted Candidates
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Take a look inside the US Park Police training and meet a few of the candidates
item.itunes:summary: Ever wanted a career in law enforcement or wanted a job where you could incorporate your love of horses? Check into an exciting and rewarding career as a member of the prestigious US Park Police! HorseGirlTV supports our nations proud servicemen and women and was honored the US Park Police permitted us to witness their training this year!
item.itunes:keywords: police, mounted, riding, cop, training, horse, horse riding, professional, interviews

item.title: PART TWO! Training US Park Police Mounted Candidates
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Take a look inside the US Park Police training and meet a few of the candidates
item.itunes:summary: Meet an experienced dressage rider US Park Police Mounted Horse Unit candidate as well as an officer from the Republic of Georgia with no prior formal riding training! Ever wanted a career in law enforcement or wanted a job where you could incorporate your love of horses? Check into an exciting and rewarding career as a member of the prestigious US Park Police! Check into an exciting and rewarding career as a member of the prestigious US Park Police! HorseGirlTV supports our nations proud servicemen and women and was honored the US Park Police permitted us to witness their training this year!
item.itunes:keywords: police, mounted, riding, cop, training, horse, horse riding, professional, interviews

item.title: How To Tie A Stock Tie
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Actually watch, learn and try it out with us
item.itunes:summary: You've requested it ON MULTIPLE OCCASIONS! You guys want more how to stuff and we've had several calls for stock tie help. You've asked for it and you've got it. Learn how simple it is to tie a beautiful stock tie and make your pre-tied stock obsolete!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, tie, stock tie, apparel, showing, jumping, dressage, dress, tack, how to

item.title: Angelea Talks With Angelea
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: The toughest interview in HorseGirlTV history
item.itunes:summary: We have heard from our viewers on many occasions wanting to know more. This webisode, an international postcard tipped the scales and our HorseGirl faced one of her more challenging interviews to date!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, dressage, celebrity, interview, showing, horsegirl, girl, professional

item.title: Eight Steps To Tame Your Fly Spray Practices
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Tune in on the how to for fewer flies
item.itunes:summary: With some help from our friends at Absorbine, we were able to put together this education webisode on what to do and not to do when applying and using fly spray. Absorbine donated over 300 dollars worth of fly spray to Chester and family at the Scarlet and Gold Riding Club aboard Camp Lejeune for this great piece! Thanks Heather!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, insects, fly, pest, absorbine, fly spray, horsegirl, girl, professional

item.title: Serious Competition at Super Ride VI
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet teen rider and drill team competitor, Maci Jayroe!
item.itunes:summary: Super Ride VI presents the 2008 United States Equestrian Drill Championship (USEDC) at the Texas Rose Horse Park near Canton, Texas. Competitors from all over flock to Super Ride VI for a chance to win the Contest of Champions and HorseGirlTV was there to talk with teen competitor and life-long drill team rider, Maci Jayroe. Watch and learn about this amazing, cost effective and family focused sport!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, teen, drill team, family, rider, competition, horsegirl, girl, teen

item.title: Basic Grooming Tips Everyone Should Know
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Tips for more effective grooming and management
item.itunes:summary: Tune in. Tack up. to learn more effective grooming and management tips. What do I need for basic grooming and horse care? What types of shampoo, conditioners, how to deter dust and debris and show touch up options. All this and more is in this episode of HorseGirlTV.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, grooming, cleaning, showing, care, competition, horsegirl, girl, teen

item.title: Meet Horseman Chris Cox
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Two time Road to the Horse Champion
item.itunes:summary: Horseman, clinician, author, personality, educator! Chris Cox does it all and then some. HorseGirlTV had the honor of interviewing Chris Cox of Chris Cox Horsemanship. Chris is a two time Road to the Horse champion and all around wonderful horse person!
item.itunes:keywords: chris cox, horseman, trainer, clinician, australian, texan, author, road to the horse

item.title: Meet ThinLine Innovator Elaine Lockhead
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Top Saddle Pad Technology
item.itunes:summary: Angelea meets up with Elaine Lockhead, creator of the ThinLine Saddle Pad to learn about this unique, one of a kind, innovative technology!
item.itunes:keywords: thinline, saddle, pad, saddle pad, innovative, equine, boots, girths, horse

item.title: Top Facility At Texas Rose Horse Park
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet Kimberly Brunson of Texas Rose Horse Park
item.itunes:summary: Texas is about all things grand and the Texas Rose Horse Park is no exception. We meet Kimberly Brunson at the Texas Rose Horse Park to learn about their facility, its events and their future plans for expansion.
item.itunes:keywords: facility, equine, boarding, showing, events, texas

item.title: How To Winterize Your Horse
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Fall is upon us so be prepared
item.itunes:summary: You're probably bringing out your winter layers, checking the fluids in your auto and turning on the heater so it's high time you think about winterizing your horse too! We got some great tips from Absorbine on how to winterize your horse and barn!
item.itunes:keywords: groom, winter, clean, fall, horse care, absorbine

item.title: HOOF it Technologies
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Advancements In Horse Hoof Care
item.itunes:summary: The folks at HOOF-it flew out to visit with Angelea and talk about innovations in horse hoof care technology. The HOOF-it people were great and Leslie was just too much fun to talk with. Angelea gets an education on repairing hooves, hoof care and high tech composite shoes. It's the way of the future!
item.itunes:keywords: hoof, horseshoe, hoof care, trail riding, riding, hooves

item.title: Carson Kressley, Celebrity and Horseman
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Style on and off the horse
item.itunes:summary: Infamous, magnanimous, salacious and any of the other "us-es" you can think of would describe Mr. Carson Kressley. Enjoy this charming interview with horseman, celebrity and stylist Carson Kressley. Carson began riding at an early age and his passion and drive has not only risen him to the top of the celebrity entertainment scene but likewise developed him into a skilled equestrian as well. We learn about what it takes to thrive in the horse world but also get a glimpse inside the amazing world of the Saddlebred breed!
item.itunes:keywords: carson kressley, how to look good naked, queer eye, celebrity, hollywood

item.title: The Importance of Horse and Human Massage
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn the benefits of horse and human massage
item.itunes:summary: Fellow forward thinking horsewomen, Doris Rollins, LMT has known the importance of horse and rider massage therapy for years and the equestrian world is finally taken note! Doris operates her offices out of Haverhill, MA but travels to shows to work with her clientele during their events. Focusing on the balance and influence of horse to rider and rider to horse, Rollins techniques not only relax and repair but likewise envigorate for pre-performance! Watch and learn more about this interesting equine innovator and the importance of treating both humans and equines like the athletes that we are!
item.itunes:keywords: massage, therapy, horse massage, equine, athlete

item.title: Step Inside Washington International Horse Show
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Pound the pavement at WIHS with HorseGirlTV!
item.itunes:summary: An equestrian tradition since 1958, the Washington International Horse Show brings top horses and riders from the U.S. and abroad, including Olympic champions, to the nation's capital to compete for more than $415,000 in prize money and championship titles. About 500 horses participate in show jumping, hunters, equitation and dressage events during the six-day show. Special exhibitions, unique shopping in 65 boutiques and a Pony Pavilion with free pony rides round out this family-friendly show. Step inside Washington International Horse Show with Angelea and HorseGirlTV!
item.itunes:keywords: horse show, wihs, washington, equine, athlete, jumper, hunter, show jumper, hunters

item.title: HorseGirlTV 3.0
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy New Year from HorseGirlTV
item.itunes:summary: HorseGirlTV is going on year number three and only gaining momentum. We are still the leading equine-based series online today and have ramped up our line up for 2009. Watch for Olympian interviews, some serious webisodes on horse and human health, more material and options with our COMING SOON Extra Bits series plus there will be more from Angelea inside the sandbox as she steps back into the competition dressage court with her amazing Oldenburg mare! The USEF (yes, that's right... the United Stated Equestrian Federation) has honored HorseGirlTV with their Best Broadcast Media Award for 2008 and we have bigger and better plans for 2009! So keep in tuning in and tacking up with HorseGirlTV!!
item.itunes:keywords: girl, horse girl, horsegirl, equestrian, equine, rider, horse show, olympian, angelea

item.title: How To Horse Shop
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: How To Horse Shop
item.itunes:summary: FEI reiner, Mike McEntire, talks about buying horses. HorseGirlTV travels to Selma, North Carolina to meet with top FEI reining competitor and trainer, Mike McEntire. In this webisode we learn the ins and outs of how to shop for horses!
item.itunes:keywords: buy, horse shop, shopping, buy a horse, how to horse shop, horse agent, horse broker, buying a horse

item.title: Walking The Course With An Olympic Gold Medalist
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Walk A Grand Prix Course With Will Simpson
item.itunes:summary: Not many of us get the chance to walk a Grand Prix course. Fewer receive the ability to walk the Washington International Horse Show Grand Prix course and even far fewer receive the honor to walk it with Olympic Gold Medalist, mentor to many and all around nice guy, Will Simpson. Watch as Angelea walks with Will and pick up some notes on reading courses and the challenges course designers present. It's a good time!
item.itunes:keywords: olympic show jumping, will simpson, show jumper, jumper, jumping course, fences, olympics

HorseGirlTV met up with Absorbine and Miss Rodeo American in the country music capital Nashville, Tennessee. item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Do not neglect proper muscle and joint care for your horse
item.itunes:summary: Both you and your horse train hard but how often do you think about proper muscle and joint care for your horse. Of course, it is always best to talk with your trainer or veterinarian before adding something new to your training plan.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, equine, athlete, muscle, health, joint, care, horse health

item.itunes:summary: Angelea had a unique moment to speak with living legend, Debbie McDonald after Brentina's retirement ceremony in Las Vegas. Ever generous with her time and energy, it was a great interview. Not only is Debbie an amazing rider and mentor to the sport, she also gives back through her work with various charities such as her "Make A Wish" girl who's now in remission. Debbie is the upcoming celebrity speaker for this years Ride For Life.

Many amazing people work hard to put this show and event together and one very special person was kind enough to come to HorseGirlTV's farm for an interview! Meet Barbara Strawson, international competitor, trainer and creator of the Dancing Horse Challenge!
item.itunes:keywords: breast cancer, cancer, awareness, event, ride, for, life, pvda, barbara, strawson

item.title: Fabulous And Functional Interlocking Mats
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: The basics of installing interlocking mats
item.itunes:summary: If you have ever install stall mats before you know they are heavy, hard, unforgiving on your back and quite often more trouble than they are worth. We discovered the Interlocking Royal Mats at the Tractor Supply Company show in Nashville when we were out visiting with the Absorbine group. Their stall mat kit was the coolest and easiest installation of mats! Heavy duty yet easy to cut with a few passes! With the interlocking there are no edges to rub and shift when the horse moves around. We installed these mats five months ago and still there is no lifting or shifting what-so-ever. AWESOME!
item.itunes:keywords: stall, barn, mats, rubber, interlocking, horse stall, stall mats

item.title: Fun With Kristin And Kat Of Draper Equine Therapy
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Tons of therapy products on the market yet here is a solid product and approach
item.itunes:summary: Kristin Draper and Kat Wojtylak of Draper Equine Therapy flew down to the HorseGirlTV studios from Boston to talk therapy products with me (Angelea). Draper has a line of products for athletes (equine and human alike) of all ages and abilities. Made with Celliant/Holofiber, these products have been clinically proven to increase and improve circulation in the body and to deliver dramatic therapeutic benefits including relief from soreness, stiffness and swelling; increased energy; and accelerated muscle recovery after exertion. The Draper saddle pad is actually the best natural fit dressage pad I've ever put on! Watch the webisode for a bit of fun education and to see the fashion as well!
item.itunes:keywords: equine, therapy, wraps, blanket, horse, theraputic

item.title: Brenderup Horse Box From Brenderup Real Trailers

item.itunes:summary: I have been watching this company since 1999 and now 10 years later I am lucky enough to have one of my own! Brenderup Real Trailers really does have the kewlest horse box money can buy. I tow it easily with my Jeep Liberty. My mare loads like a champ. Everything about this horse box is awesome. There are tons of neat features beyond my favorites and I am sure they would be happy to send you a free DVD covering all the options so check the link below.

item.title: Interview With Anky van Grunsven
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Anky van Grunsven, three time Olympic Gold Medals, clinician, rider, mom, inspiration to many
item.itunes:summary: It goes without saying that Anky van Grunsven has been one of the top dressage riders in the world for the last decade. Her accolades include the gold medal in the 2000 Olympics with her horse Bonfire and gold in the 2004 Olympics and in the 2008 Olympics with Saliner. She dominates World Cup Dressage competition, being named the World Cup Dressage Champion eight times, in 1995, 1996, 1997, 1999, 2000, 2004, 2005, and 2006, 2008. Angelea had a unique opportunity to interview Anky while also training with her at her stable in The Netherlands.
item.itunes:keywords: anky, anky van grunsven, grunsven, olympian, olympics, dressage, sports, horse

item.title: Elite In Sport But Not Elitism With Dane Rawlins
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: HorseGirl Mail, Talk To The Pros
item.itunes:summary: Tom from Kansas wants to know how we can improve the quality of the horse industry as a whole in the United States. Perhaps we should listen to top international rider and show organizer, Dane Rawlins? Dane's brilliantly yet simply states that while we need elite in sport to constantly improve top sport riding we don't need elitism. Watch and learn from this great rider and passionate horseman! Thanks for your question and thanks for watching HorseGirlTV!
item.itunes:keywords: sport, horse, top sport, international rider, elite, dressage, dane, rawlins

item.title: International Horse Shopping For Sport Horses
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet Sport Horse Agent, Geoff Butler, And Learn About International Horse Shopping
item.itunes:summary: Meet sport horses sales agent, clinician and trainer, Geoff Butler. Geoff is huge on listening to his client's needs and wishes, trying to accommodate them. In a world full of horse companies offering sales and training, Geoff's ideals are that very few that can match his personalized approach that truly puts the client’s needs first. Angelea inquires about some tough horse shopping questions and uncovers some basic how to items for horse shopping aboard!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, sport, sporthorse, shop, buy, how to buy a horse

item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV

item.itunes:summary: Sandra from Southern California asks HorseGirlTV if we'd show the basics of how to wrap with an under wrap and polo. Sure thing Sandra! We’ve asked Janine at the stable of Anky van Grunsven if she'd show us how! Thanks for your question Sandra and thanks for watching HorseGirlTV!
item.itunes:keywords: wrap, bandage, polo, standing wrap, horse wrap

item.title: Dentistry Without Drama With Geoff Tucker
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Geoff Tucker, DVM Equine Veterinarian Specializing In Horse Dentistry
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Tucker has been with horses professionally since 1973. He worked full time on a Thoroughbred breeding and training farm in Bedford Hills, NY. He started as a manure engineer and worked his way up to assistant farm manager. There were up to 20 horses in training and up to 100 mares foaling during the breeding season and about 10 stallions standing at stud. As the foaling manager, Dr. Tucker attended all foalings and assisted deliveries either before the vet arrived or with the help of the vet. He was also responsible for all the preventive medicine on the farm. Angelea talks with Geoff about his passion to give relieve horses and their owners through his natural, low stress methods.
item.itunes:keywords: dentist, vet, veterinary, veterinarian, dentistry, horse, horse vet

item.title: GGT Footing And The Attwood Pros
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: HorseGirlTV Talks With Nick Attwood Of Attwood Equestrian Surfaces About Installing GGT Footing
item.itunes:summary: Several decades of experience with equestrian surfaces, makes Nick Attwood the perfect person to talk with about producing an effective sport horse training surface. Angelea met with Nick Attwood of Attwood Equestrian Surfaces to talk about the installation of GGT, German Geo Textile, footing. GGT-Footing, a shredded textile, that stabilizes the sand particles mimicing the effect of the rooting system of turf, which has a stabilizing effect on the surrounding soil particles. GGT footing give more resilience, reduces the amount of packing and helps to hold moisture in the surface, which leads to reduced dust. The secret with GGT really is in the sand.
item.itunes:keywords: arena, footing, sand, blend, dressage, court, riding, surface, equestrian, ggt

item.title: Shake n Fork
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Stall Cleaning Is A Cinch With Shake'n Fork
item.itunes:summary: Many of the HorseGirlTV fans have emailed about the manure fork we've used in previous webisodes so we're opting simply to show you all how it works. It's a pretty neat fork that definitely saves on the back breaking work of stall picking. At the farm here in NC, we've been using it for over a year now and enjoy it very much. The innovator that created this fork, Joseph Berto, is located in Oregon and passionate about creating time saving and technologically advanced farm related products. We think the folks handling the Gulf Coast oil spill need to connect with him about his tarball fork to help with the clean up efforts!
item.itunes:keywords: horse, clean, stall, muck, manure, bucket, fork, pitch, rake

item.title: Innovative Drainage Options
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Angelea Chats With Woody Woodward Of Infiltrator Systems About Ag Drainage
item.itunes:summary: In the search for the perfect drainage system, HorseGirlTV found a recycled product that is easy to install as, or more, cost effective to rock and pipe called EZ Flow. That's a win-win-win situation. The EZ Flow system is designed to improve drainfield performance by eliminating the fines associated with crushed stone, and reducing compaction and embedment associated with stone. Watch as we chat with Woody Woodward of Infiltrator Systems and install arena drainage in a snap!
item.itunes:keywords: drain, arena, septic, drainage, water, field, lines

item.title: The HorseGirl Supplement, Flex Max
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: HorseGirl Mail: What supplement does HorseGirl use?
item.itunes:summary: Many viewers have emailed in asking about what Angelea uses around the farm for feed, forage and supplements so we decided to cover the basics of supplements. The preferred supplement around the HorseGirlTV farm is Flex plus Max because it contains everything we could want in a supplement in it so there's one bucket, one scoop and it's definitely a time saver too. The plus side is being able to feed it to the dogs as well and they love the taste as much as the horses. We use the pellets but you can get it in a powder as well. For more info on Flex plus Max you can check out Absorbine's website.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, rider, supplement, feeding, nutrition, absorbine

item.itunes:summary: Angelea had the distinct honor of working with Attwood Equestrian Surfaces and the owner of AES took time to travel to HorseGirlTV studios to meet and interview with Angelea! item.title: Grand Prix Trainer, Judge, and Long Time Dressage Sport Mentor, Elizabeth Madlener
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet USA Dressage Living Legend Elizabeth Madlener
item.itunes:summary: Ask and you shall receive! Fans often write in asking for HorseGirlTV to interview this or that person. A fan wrote in over the summer asking us to interview Elizabeth Madlener and here you go! Elizabeth is a well-known Grand Prix level trainer, instructor and competitor, a USEF "S" judge since 1980, USDF "L" faculty member, Dressage Today contributor, and former President and CEO of the Maryland Horse Center. Elizabeth is currently based in the Southern Maryland area, but travels frequently across the country as a clinician and judge.
item.itunes:keywords: dressage, usa, judge, grand prix, trainer, training, sport mentor, legend

item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet USA Dressage Living Legend Elizabeth Madlener
item.itunes:summary: This is part II of our fan driven webisode interview with Elizabeth Madlener! Fans often write in asking for HorseGirlTV to interview this or that person. A fan wrote in over the summer asking us to interview Elizabeth Madlener and here you go! Elizabeth is a well-known Grand Prix level trainer, instructor and competitor, a USEF "S" judge since 1980, USDF "L" faculty member, Dressage Today contributor, and former President and CEO of the Maryland Horse Center. Elizabeth is currently based in the Southern Maryland area, but travels frequently across the country as a clinician and judge.
item.itunes:keywords: dressage, usa, judge, grand prix, trainer, training, sport mentor, legend

item.title: Author Of The Science Of Motion, Jean Luc Cornille
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet French Olympian Jean Luc Cornille
item.itunes:summary: Jean Luc Cornille has gained worldwide recognition by applying practical science to the training of the equine athlete. Influenced by his background as a gymnast, Jean Luc deeply understands how equine training can be enhanced by contemporary scientific research. A unique combination of riding skill, training experience and extensive knowledge of the equine physiology enables Jean Luc to translate scientific insights into a language comprehensible to both horse and rider. This approach has been the trademark of his training. Meet Jean Luc and learn about his approach on HorseGirlTV.
item.itunes:keywords: dressage, olympian, french, rider, jumper, show, jump, classical, olympic, france

item.title: Mary Bahniuk Lauritsen, From Set To Saddle
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet Former Young Rider, Model, Trainer Mary Bahniuk Lauritsen
item.itunes:summary: Watch as we talk with such an inspiring ambitious and talented young lady, Mary Bahniuk Lauritsen about how she creatively juggles all her projects. Mary Bahniuk Lauritsen is a rider, trainer, and competitor in dressage, a model, a volunteer, a videographer and a slightly ambitious young lady. Mary is based out of her family owned farm, Cadence Farm of Harvard, Massachusetts. She has been actively competing in dressage since she was nine years old and has successfully shown up to Prix St. George. Mary is active within the sport in and out of the saddle.
item.itunes:keywords: dressage, young, rider, trainer, model, usdf, sport, horse, olympic

item.title: HorseGirlTV Classics, Developing Your Equestrian Career
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Rewind with HorseGirlTV. What was it like to groom for Anky van Grunsven at Aachen? How to develop your career.
item.itunes:summary: Educational and entertaining content is timeless which is why we're launching HorseGirlTV Classics! After producing five years of amazing equine-based content in new media we realized that some of our fan base may have never seen our early years. We take a look back to classic HorseGirlTV webisodes. What was it like grooming for Anky van Grunsven? Let's chat with Tiffany Tyler and find out. In this pilot episode of HorseGirlTV we meet former groom of Anky van Grunsen, Tiffany Tyler and learn some of Anky's grooming secrets! We catch up with Tiffany in Ashland, Oregon where she continues to develop her career in competitive equestrian sports. Tiffany plans to show this season and aspires to compete on an international level in the CDIs.
item.itunes:keywords: horse, horses, equine, equestrian, horse tv, horse video, dressage, anky, anky van grunsven, olympic, olympian

With the farm studio in full swing on the East Coast, implementing and testing quality environmentally friendly products has never been easier. item.title: Straightforward Watering Solutions
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Arena Watering With The Rapid Rain
item.itunes:summary: We get lots of questions about how we do things around the studio and stable at HorseGirlTV and do our best to answer as many as possible via the webisodes. We have a pretty neat watering solution for arenas and pastures called the Rapid Rain. It's a simple to use, low maintenance device! Rapid Rain is manufactured in the USA which is always a big plus when we're researching products at HorseGirlTV! The Rapid Rain allows easy watering by automatically rewinding the hose and sprinkler, and shutting off when you choose. No need to move sprinklers around to different areas, or maintain a complicated and costly permanent system. Whether it's watering your yard, dust control for your horse arena, or anywhere else you need a portable watering system, there's a Rapid Rain model that does the work for you! It's definitely on our list of cool tools!
item.itunes:keywords: watering, arena, automated, sprinkler, rapid, rain, dressage, court, footing

item.title: Wild Horses Of Shackleford Banks
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Travel with HorseGirlTV to witness eastern shore wild horses
item.itunes:summary: Shackleford Banks, the southern-most barrier island in Cape Lookout National Seashore, is home to more than 110 wild horses. This is one of the few places in the eastern United States where wild horses can still be seen. Shackleford Banks is approximately nine miles long and averages less than a mile wide. It contains many habitats, unique to barrier islands, which support the horses. Come along with Angelea as she meets a Horse Wildlife Biologist and take a walk around Shackleford Banks viewing some of the wild horse island residents.
item.itunes:keywords: wild, horse, pony, shackleford, banks, island

item.title: Valerie Ormond And Believing In Horses
item.itunes:author: Horse Girl TV
item.itunes:subtitle: Believing In Horses tells the story of a young girl in a military family who commits to saving unwanted horses
item.itunes:summary: Valerie spent the majority of her adult life as a Naval Intelligence Officer. The daughter of two English majors, and an English major herself, she always had a great interest in books and writing. Just prior to her retirement from the Navy, someone suggested she turn an idea she had into a book, and from there her second career began.
item.itunes:keywords: horse book, author, horse writer, writer, writing
